notes.body: Hello Deepya,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regards to your order #653990504131207168-26780, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.     As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 06th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.      We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Deepya,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #653990504131207168-26780, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.

As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 06th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future. 

We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Parul,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  This email is with regards to your order #653246379488796672-90740. As checked, your concern was highlighted for the incorrect pricing of the medicines. We apologize for any inconvenience caused to you with your order.  As per the update received from our team, please be informed that an issue was raised for the incorrect pricing of LIVEASY WELLNESS MULTIVITAMIN MULTIMINERAL - IMMUNITY BOOSTER - COMPLETE NUTRITION - BOTTLE OF 60. As checked, the issue is verified, and a refund of Rs.18.19/- has been ​initiated on 2nd December 2025. You will receive the refund to your payment source within 5 to 7 business days.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.  Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.       Regards,  PharmEasy.
notes.body_html:
Hello Parul,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

This email is with regards to your order #653246379488796672-90740. As checked, your concern was highlighted for the incorrect pricing of the medicines. We apologize for any inconvenience caused to you with your order.

As per the update received from our team, please be informed that an issue was raised for the incorrect pricing of LIVEASY WELLNESS MULTIVITAMIN MULTIMINERAL - IMMUNITY BOOSTER - COMPLETE NUTRITION - BOTTLE OF 60. As checked, the issue is verified, and a refund of Rs.18.19/- has been ​initiated on 2nd December 2025. You will receive the refund to your payment source within 5 to 7 business days.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
PharmEasy.
Informed issue was verified.

notes.body: Hello V P Kakkar,      Greetings from PharmEasy!     I understand your concern with regard to the order ID 654075003607425024, 654054798213513216, and 654043112879661056. I will surely assist you with this, and I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.     I have highlighted the issue to the Courier team for cancelling the order. We will respond with the update as soon as we receive any from them.     Further, the order is cancelled within 24-48 hours of placing a request. In case the delivery is attempted, you can also refuse it at the time of delivery.      Please note that once your order is marked as cancelled, the refund will be initiated to your original payment source. You can expect to receive the refund within 5 to 7 business days.     I appreciate your patience in the meantime.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal
notes.body_html:
Hello V P Kakkar,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

I understand your concern with regard to the order ID 654075003607425024, 654054798213513216, and 654043112879661056. I will surely assist you with this, and I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.

I have highlighted the issue to the Courier team for cancelling the order. We will respond with the update as soon as we receive any from them.

Further, the order is cancelled within 24-48 hours of placing a request. In case the delivery is attempted, you can also refuse it at the time of delivery. 

Please note that once your order is marked as cancelled, the refund will be initiated to your original payment source. You can expect to receive the refund within 5 to 7 business days.

I appreciate your patience in the meantime.

Regards,
Sandhya Nackwal

notes.body: Hello Mouna,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with reference to the concern raised for order #654027375074877440-99760.     We have received an update from our logistics team. As per the update, your order has been delivered to you. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you. We have shared the required feedback with the delivery agent and we will make sure that such instances are not repeated in the future.     Please consider this as a one-off instance as we aim to provide the best of services to our customers and such instances are very rare.     Since you are a valued customer, as a token of apology, we have credited Rs.30/- to your PharmEasy wallet on 2 December 2025.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. PharmEasy looks forward to bettering your experience in the future.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,   PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Mouna,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
This email is with reference to the concern raised for order #654027375074877440-99760.
 
We have received an update from our logistics team. As per the update, your order has been delivered to you. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you. We have shared the required feedback with the delivery agent and we will make sure that such instances are not repeated in the future.
 
Please consider this as a one-off instance as we aim to provide the best of services to our customers and such instances are very rare.

Since you are a valued customer, as a token of apology, we have credited Rs.30/- to your PharmEasy wallet on 2 December 2025.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. PharmEasy looks forward to bettering your experience in the future.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards, 
PharmEasy

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Hi Dhaval Shah,

Just checking in on my earlier email. PharmEasy has been selected in the recent employee survey as one of the Most Preferred Workplaces in Healthcare, Pharma & Biotech 2025–26, and we would be delighted to have your team join us at the celebrations gala on 11th December 2025 at Novotel, Andheri East.

I’m also happy to share that several notable names from the Healthcare, Pharma & Biotech sectors have already confirmed their participation, further elevating the platform’s credibility and visibility:


  *   Abbott
  *   Cadila Pharma
  *   Cipla
  *   Dr. Lal PathLabs
  *   AstraZeneca India
  *   Apollo Hospitals
  *   Sun Pharma
  *   Pfizer
  *   Bayer
  *   Kauvery Hospital


We’re now in the final round of confirmations and given PharmEasy strong people culture, this is a great opportunity to spotlight your leadership story on a respected national stage supported by Times Now and Business Standard.

Could we schedule a quick call this week to confirm participation?

Looking forward to your response.

Warm regards,
Anjali Singh
7770093394

From: Anjali Singh
Subject: Most Preferred Workplaces in Healthcare, Pharma & Biotech 2025–26 | Times Now | Business Standard

[cid:image001.jpg@01DC6381.84F59410]

Dear Dhaval Shah,

“The future of healthcare will not be built by technology alone, but by people empowered by purpose, compassion, and innovation.” – RK

India’s healthcare and life sciences sector stands at a defining moment, powered by purpose, innovation, and global ambition. With the industry poised to cross USD 638 billion by 2031, and Pharma & Biotech expected to surpass USD 130 billion by 2030, India is fast emerging as a world leader in affordable healthcare innovation. Yet, this rapid growth brings an urgent challenge, the human capital gap. With a projected need for 1.8 million additional healthcare professionals by 2030 and a 30–35% talent gap in critical pharma roles, organizations must now compete not just on products and science, but on culture, capability, and workforce wellbeing.

Most Preferred Workplaces in Healthcare, Pharma & Biotech 2025–26, This prestigious industry initiative celebrates organizations that are redefining the future of work in healthcare, those building purpose-driven, people-centric, and innovation-led cultures. It recognizes businesses that go beyond employment to empower, inspire, and transform lives, within the organization and beyond.

I would like to take this moment to congratulate ‘PharmEasy’ on being chosen in the recent employee survey as one of the 'Most Preferred Workplaces in Healthcare, Pharma & Biotech for 2025-26'. This recognition reflects the values and environment that make your organization truly stand out in the industry. The gala event will take place on the morning of 11th December 2025 at Novotel, Andheri East, Mumbai

Backed by in-depth industry research conducted by Leadcap Ventures, this platform honors excellence and sets new benchmarks for progressive people practices across Healthcare, Pharma, and Biotech.

This recognition evaluates organizations on key pillars such as:


  *   Talent Attraction & Retention
  *   Learning, Upskilling & Leadership Development
  *   Employee Wellbeing & Mental Health
  *   Inclusion, Equity & Representation
  *   Digital & Workplace Transformation

Sharing with you post event links of our previous editions:

Dedicated Website for Most Preferred Workplaces<https://preferredworkplace.com/>
Post Show Report of the Previous Editions for Most Preferred Workplaces<https://preferredworkplace.com/MPW-2024-Post-show-report.pdf>


We invite your organization to be part of this impactful journey and share your story of leadership, innovation, and culture transformation.

I would be delighted to connect and explore how PharmEasy can be a part of this year’s edition. Please let me know a convenient time for a brief discussion.

Wishing you the best of the festive season!

Warm regards,
Anjali Singh
7770093394





--

helpdesk_ticket.subject: Most Preferred Workplaces in Healthcare, Pharma & Biotech 2025–26 | Times Now | Business Standard
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Hi Dhaval Shah,
 
Just checking in on my earlier email. PharmEasy has been selected in the recent employee survey as one of the Most Preferred Workplaces in Healthcare, Pharma & Biotech 2025–26, and we would be delighted to have your team join us at the celebrations gala on 11th December 2025 at Novotel, Andheri East.
 
I’m also happy to share that several notable names from the Healthcare, Pharma & Biotech sectors have already confirmed their participation, further elevating the platform’s credibility and visibility:
 
  • Abbott
  • Cadila Pharma
  • Cipla
  • Dr. Lal PathLabs
  • AstraZeneca India
  • Apollo Hospitals
  • Sun Pharma
  • Pfizer
  • Bayer
  • Kauvery Hospital
 
 
We’re now in the final round of confirmations and given PharmEasy strong people culture, this is a great opportunity to spotlight your leadership story on a respected national stage supported by Times Now and Business Standard.
 
Could we schedule a quick call this week to confirm participation?
 
Looking forward to your response.
 
Warm regards,
Anjali Singh
7770093394
